meta.venue: Bharat Mandapam, Pragati Maidan, New Delhi

keynote_speakers.name: PM Narendra Modi
keynote_speakers.topic: India at forefront of AI transformation; invited global data to reside in India; tax holiday to 2047 for cloud providers; 15% Safe Harbour margin; $18B semiconductor projects

keynote_speakers.name: Sam Altman
keynote_speakers.topic: India as full-stack AI leader; 100M+ weekly Indian ChatGPT users; Democratic AI framework (Access, Adoption, Agency); building AI in India, with India, for India

keynote_speakers.name: Sundar Pichai
keynote_speakers.topic: Future of work; massive India infrastructure investments through 2030

keynote_speakers.name: Dario Amodei
keynote_speakers.topic: AI safety and governance; opened first India office in Bengaluru; India is 2nd-largest Claude market after US

keynote_speakers.name: Demis Hassabis
keynote_speakers.topic: Ethics of sentient-like models; future of work

keynote_speakers.name: Emmanuel Macron
keynote_speakers.topic: India-France bilateral AI cooperation; summit keynote

keynote_speakers.name: Brad Smith
keynote_speakers.topic: AI infrastructure; ‚Çπ1.5 lakh crore India investment for data centres and AI training

keynote_speakers.name: Michael Kremer
keynote_speakers.topic: AI for Social Good ‚Äî Impact That Works (J-PAL session with MIT)

day_1.session: Future of Employability in the Age of AI
Role of Contextual Norms in Designing Better AI Systems
AI for Road Safety: Data-Driven Solutions
Global AI Impact Challenges ‚Äî Grand Finale Day 1
PM Modi Inaugurates India AI Impact Expo
day_1.speakers: PM Modi ‚Äî launched 12 foundation models; data reside in India

day_1.session: India's Journey from Tradition to Technology

day_1.speakers: 5 AI short films: Language of Birds, Migoi, Uttarayan, The Barber's Secret, Yappasauras

day_2.session: J-PAL: AI for Social Good ‚Äî Impact That Works
day_2.speakers: Michael Kremer (Nobel Laureate), Iqbal Dhaliwal (J-PAL/MIT), S. Krishnan (Secretary MeitY), Ziad Obermeyer (UC Berkeley), Maggie Johnson (Google.org), Abhishek Singh (IndiaAI Mission)
World Bank + Gates Foundation; Antonio Zaballos (ADB), Dr. J. Ganesan (Govt of Haryana)

day_2.session: Harnessing AI for Equitable Health Systems
day_2.speakers: Mamta Murthi (VP, World Bank), Dr. Geetha Manjunath (Niramai), Dr. Karthik Adapa (WHO SEARO)

day_2.session: The AI-Energy-Finance Trifecta: Future-Proofing India's Datacenters
Relevance of Life Skills Education in the Age of AI

day_2.speakers: Casebooks on Health, Energy, Education, Agriculture, Gender, Disabilities

day_2.session: Global AI Impact Challenges ‚Äî Awards Ceremony

Discussion with Global Dialogue on AI Governance Co-Chairs
day_3.speakers: H.E. Egriselda Lopez (El Salvador), H.E. Rein Tammsaar (Estonia)

day_3.session: Research Symposium on AI and its Impact
day_3.speakers: IIIT Hyderabad partner; 3 tracks: big questions, research talks, Global South posters

day_3.session: CPRG: Data for Development ‚Äî Building AI in the Global South

day_4.speakers: 20+ heads of state: Modi, Macron, Lula da Silva, Guterres + 17 more
PM Modi 1-on-1s with 35-40 corporate leaders including Mukesh Ambani
Sundar Pichai (Alphabet), Sam Altman (OpenAI), Dario Amodei (Anthropic), Demis Hassabis (DeepMind), Brad Smith (Microsoft)

day_4.session: Shekhar Kapur Masterclass ‚Äî Filmmaking in the AI Era

day_5.session: AI for Inclusive and Resilient Food Systems
day_5.speakers: Mathias Cormann (OECD SG), Harry Verweij (Netherlands AI Envoy), Dejan Jakovljevic (CIO, FAO)

day_5.session: CPRG: Reimagining Education in the Age of AI
day_5.speakers: Jitin Prasada (MoS), Anne Neuberger (Fmr US Deputy NSA), Sanjeev Bikhchandani (Info Edge), Gokul Subramaniam (Intel India)

day_5.session: UN ODET: The Role of Science in International AI Governance
Hornbill Dream ‚Äî Where Tradition Meets Technology

day_5.speakers: Collective commitments; shared roadmap for global AI governance

foundation_models.model_name: Sarvam Vision / Bulbul v3 / Sarvam Edge
foundation_models.focus: Multilingual voice-first AI; outperformed Gemini/ChatGPT on Indic benchmarks; offline on-device AI
22-language sovereign model; trained on Bharat Data Sagar dataset
India's first reasoning model; STEM, medical diagnostics, analytics
Optimized for Indic languages; agentic AI platform for e-governance
Fine-tuned for Indian languages in agriculture, healthcare, governance
Voice AI, speech processing for Indian languages
22+ Indian languages; India's first AI unicorn
LLMs for 1.5B people; met PM Modi Jan 2026
Physics-based AI; materials science, engineering design
Lab automation, novel materials (alloys, battery components)

deals_and_investments.detail: AI and cloud infrastructure in India through 2030
$600M equity + $600M debt; deploying 20,000+ GPUs; co-investors: Teachers' Venture Growth, TVS Capital, 360 ONE, Nexus
38,000+ GPUs, 1,050 TPUs at subsidised rates; separate 3,000 next-gen GPU cluster for sovereign/strategic use
For AI and advanced manufacturing startups
Cloud infrastructure and AI-driven digitization by 2030
Rack-scale AI infrastructure using MI455X GPUs, EPYC Venice, ROCm; 200 MW data centre blueprint
Multifold GPU capacity expansion from ~10,000 GPUs
Data center power solutions; backed by Peak XV, Yali Deeptech, TDK Ventures

country_pavilions.highlight: Largest international pavilion; President Macron delivering keynote Feb 19-20
LLM Takane, MONAKA processor (Arm-based, high perf/low power), quantum computer mock-up
Deputy PM David Lammy; AI Minister Kanishka Narayan; announcing AI4D Observatory
PM Dick Schoof attending as head of state
President attending as head of state

survival_tips.detail: Multi-hour queues reported later in the day
UPI and digital payments failed on Day 1 due to patchy internet
Mobile internet barely worked inside the venue
PM Modi's Day 1 visit caused midday hall evacuation for security
Pragati Maidan Metro (Blue Line) ‚Äî open full day; recommended
The 70,000 sq.m venue is enormous ‚Äî don't walk everything
Food counters were overwhelmed on Day 1 (Swiggy/Zepto kiosks available)
With 10 arenas and 300+ pavilions, aimless wandering wastes hours
QR-based entry and real-time schedule updates
Outside venue in case of security-related shutdowns

checklist: Plan your route by chakra zones
world_leaders: Leaders from Bolivia, Croatia, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Guyana, Kazakhstan, Liechtenstein, Serbia, Slovakia

usispf_delegation.description: Largest-ever US industry delegation to an AI summit
